titleStmt.title: The horse-manship of England most particularly relating to the breeding and training of the running-horse. A poem dedicated to his grace the Duke of Monmouth.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns at the lower end of Cheapside, near Mercers Chappel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
